attributes.action: increase the £10 pensioners Christmas bonus to £20 and uplift in line with inflation thereafter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the £10 pensioners Christmas bonus was introduced in 1972, it has never been increased for inflation and today enjoys the equivalent purchasing power of just £1.15.

To make the bonus more meaningful, the sum should be doubled to £20 and increased in line with inflation thereafter.

government_responses.details:
